fvtt-bcdice.persistanceSettingHint: Should the roller stay open after submitting a roll?
fvtt-bcdice.replacementsTextHint: Format is "name=value" per line, use "{name}" in a macro, the formula input or even another replacement!
fvtt-bcdice.systemSettingHint: Set the default system to be used
fvtt-bcdice.deleteTabBody: Are you sure you want to delete this tab, with all it's headers and macros?
fvtt-bcdice.deleteHeaderBody: Are you sure you want to delete this header, including all the macros on it?
fvtt-bcdice.keybindHint: This keybind will open the BCDice Roller, as an alternative to the sidebar button
fvtt-bcdice.formulaPersistanceSettingHin: Should the formula in the text input stay after pressing Enter / Roll?
